title: Cheap lookalike for Dogma Bold
content: As stated in the title, does anyone knows a look-a-like for Dogma Bold. We cannot afford the 39 dollar.... so we will settle for the next best?
author: boesh

comments.content: Try searching DaFont site, maybe you will have some luck.
Yves, I've given up trying to educate, now my tactic is to let the "free font people" see real junk and hopefully they will go running to their wallets to pay for a license.
